title: Guess the price of these mid-terrace bungalows in our quiz
text:
They are often associated with the over 55 retirement market, but bungalows can come in all shapes and sizes and for all ages.

Around the country, there are terrace bungalows that can be highly sought-after - and are not restricted to retired buyers - with prices to match.

The single-storey terrace properties can provide a modern low-maintenance living space - in many cases, for those who find stairs a problem.

Can you guess the price of this two-bedroom mid-terrace bungalow in Holt, Norfolk?

Within a block of terrace bungalows, there is the so-called 'mid-terrace' version, which may be considered a cheap option.

However, don't be fooled as we've selected 10 mid-terrace bungalows around Britain - including ones in Scotland and Wales - where the prices are higher than the average value of a home in Britain.

Can you guess the price of this one-bed mid-terrace bungalow in Lochgilphead, Scotland?

In our quiz, can you work out the difference between the one that costs almost half a million pounds and the one that cost less than £50,000?

The most expensive of our mid-terrace bungalows outstrips the average value of a British home, which currently stands at £309,373, according to property website Zoopla.

Try our quiz below and put your property-price knowledge to the test by finding out if you can tell which of these mid-terrace bungalows are the most expensive.

If you're unable to see the quiz in the MailOnline app or in Facebook Instant Articles please click on this link to see it.
description: We've selected 10 mid-terrace bungalows around Britain, but can you work out the difference between the one that costs almost half a million pounds and the one that cost less than £50,000?
